# Vue Rich Text Editor

![NPM License](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/vue-chat-elements)

**Lightweight** [Vue](https://vuejs.org/) component to be full-featured textarea replacement   **< 10k** ðŸ˜Ž <br>

![rte](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/91323932/274598102-96e1917c-cd4f-4fb1-8492-19eea44f566b.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Jgru2rJ2geLr9z6gGP4-YiTGgn2miQUFfb2viSQ8gjs)

## Usage

`npm i vue-rte`

```
<script setup>
import Rte from 'vue-rte';
import 'vue-rte/dist/style.css';
</script>


<template>
<Rte/>
</template
```
